name: 2nd Asia Pacific Conference on Nursing Science and Healthcare
content: BioLEAGUES Worldwide invites you to 2nd Asia Pacific Conference on Nursing Science and Healthcare planned during September 25th - 26th, 2020 in Colombo, Sri Lanka. Nursing Conferences 2020 in Sri Lanka is one of the biggest universal gatherings on Nursing. With a few propelled practice attendants, for example, nurture experts, clinical medical caretaker masters, nurture anesthetists, nurture birthing assistants, and medical caretaker advisors, alongside scientists, teachers, managers, strategy producers and understudies expected to go to the meeting. Nursing meetings 2020 vows to be an energizing and remunerating chance to adapt together. Year 2020 named as Year of the Nurse Endorsed by World Health Organization (WHO) in acknowledgment of Florence Nightingale's 200th birthday celebration.
